name: Project T (Bixel, enesbahtiyar, huxull, huseyinged1k, Ahmet Melih Islam)
name_original: Project T (Bixel, enesbahtiyar, huxull, huseyinged1k, Ahmet Melih Islam)
description:
PROJECT T

This is the prototype of our Tower Defense 2D game developed with Unity 2021. All the sprite and tiles seen in this video are from FoozleCC. All mechanics are developed by us. It's still a work in progress.

- Umut Tanış (Game Designer and Level Designer)

- Ahmet Melih İslam (Game Developer)

- Enes Bahtiyar (Game Developer)

- Hüseyin Gedik (Game Developer)

- Emre Kaçan (Sound Design)
